author: Xbox
description:
Xbox was back at the world's biggest video game show. Couldn't make it to Cologne? We're bringing you all the best moments from two days of live broadcasts from the heart of the Xbox booth.

Catch up on some of the first-look gameplay, developer interviews, fresh trailers, and updates from our first-party studios and partners around the world. 

From the ROG Xbox Ally handheld demo to new Grounded 2 reveals to fresh gameplay of Keeper, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Ninja Gaiden 4, Onimusha, and more, our Xbox gamescom 2025 show was packed full of announcements, new trailers, gameplay reveals, and even the Silksong release date.

Whether you're catching up here, or checking out the full broadcast, we’re thrilled to share what’s next for Xbox.

Broadcast Day 1: https://youtu.be/lu6R8W91lM8?list=PL0il2l-B_WwbvsoZVepTwhJuNRq8-XO7v
Broadcast Day 2: https://youtu.be/P45cJ2HdFh4?list=PL0il2l-B_WwbvsoZVepTwhJuNRq8-XO7v

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com
title: Xbox @ gamescom Broadcast 2025 | Recap
